price: 65. Boye ozali kornona te, ya sólo Allah asaleli bino nyoso oyo ezali o mokili, mpe masuwa ezali kotambola okati ya ebale na mibeko mia ye? Mpe asimbi likolo mpo ekweyela mabele te, sé na bolingi bwa ye. Ya sólo, Allah azali malamu atonda ngolu mpo na bato.
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَخَّرَ لَكُم مَّا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَٱلۡفُلۡكَ تَجۡرِي فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ بِأَمۡرِهِۦ وَيُمۡسِكُ ٱلسَّمَآءَ أَن تَقَعَ عَلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِٱلنَّاسِ لَرَءُوفٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: alam tara anna al-laha sakhara lakum mā fī al-arḍi wal-ful'ka tajrī fī al-baḥri bi-amrihi wayum'siku al-samāa an taqaʿa ʿalā al-arḍi illā bi-idh'nihi inna al-laha bil-nāsi laraūfun raḥīmun
